text:
I created a workflow to trigger when a contact owner is known. Then I wrote a piece of custom code to retrieve the contact owner via the owners api, take the first name and last name as separate elements and create a callback with 'Meeting link' set as an interpolated string to suit HubSpot's link structure.

I then use that property to set a 'Meeting Link' property against the deal and call it as a personalization token in emails, sms and wherever I like thereafter :slightly_smiling_face:.

I hope that helps.

Hey guys,
can you please help with the following?
I am trying to send an email with the template which has dynamic placeholders
and a button which is having a link to it. and I want to send a unique token to it which is generated by my java application. and after clicking that button we will verify the user with the help of a token
is it doable from the HubSpot?
